metadata.title: CVE-2024-39475 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fbdev: savage: Handle err return when savagefb_check_var failedThe commit 04e5eac8f3ab("fbdev: savage: Error out if pixclock equals zero")checks the value of pixclock to avoid divide-by-zero error. Howeverthe function savagefb_probe doesn't handle the error return ofsavagefb_check_var. When pixclock is 0, it will cause divide-by-zero error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
